titles.title: Honoring the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 10/5/2011--Introduced. Honors the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University in the District of Columbia. (The Cultural Initiative, Inc. is a Howard University student-run corporation established to produce hip hop conferences and related projects.)
